resources.string: It has reached the longest digits

Reference:

 1. http://tianya23.blog.51cto.com/1081650/681428
 2. http://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/MD5
 3. http://www.guokr.com/article/81430/

 MD5("")
 = d41d8cd98f00b204e9800998ecf8427e

 MD5("The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog")
 = 9e107d9d372bb6826bd81d3542a419d6

 For security reason, we suggest that please use different combination for different web sites:
 E.g. For facebook: facebook+user+currentMonth+specialCharactor: facebookTom11&
 And please update password regularly, "facebookTom12&" instead for next month.
